short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Personal Short URL Manager. Save your favourite URLs and access them with a tiny url of your choice

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension to help you create and manage your own custom shortcuts for any URL. No more hassles of bookmarks you can't find.

Create a shortcut with any valid URL and a key of your choice. Access the URL by typing 'q/<key>' in the address bar.

The extension does not share user's data with the developer or any third party. All data is stored in the user's device.
